propertyDescriptor.name: EmployeeContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the containerPath to the folder holding the primary data for employees and compliance records. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/compliance'

propertyDescriptor.name: EmployeeDefaultView
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the default view to show on the employees table

propertyDescriptor.name: PDFContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the containerPath to the folder holding the list of PDFs shared between public and private folder. The PDF list has a Linked schema between both folders, the actual files have to reside in the public folder Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/compliance'
